TheParasitized:pi_callOfSwarm_power.NAME: 大群之唤
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合开始时，升级所有手牌；你的手牌没有上限

TheParasitized:pi_growth_power.NAME: 野蛮生长
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗结束时，恢复生命值

TheParasitized:pi_sacrifice_power.NAME: 牺牲
DESCRIPTIONS: 你可以打出诅咒牌，打出诅咒牌时，抽牌

TheParasitized:pi_wither_power.NAME: 凋零
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合结束时，失去生命值，使buff来源恢复同等生命值
